Title: From Russia with Love
Writer: Richard Maibaum, Johanna Harwood, Ian Fleming
Actors: Sean Connery, Robert Shaw, Lotte Lenya
Plot: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination plot involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by the organization Spectre.
Language: English, Russian, Turkish, French, Romany, Italian
Country: United Kingdom, United States, Turkey, Italy
Awards: Won 1 BAFTA Award3 wins & 6 nominations total
